sort.name: sort
sort.description: property to sort by (prepend '-' for descending)

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

verify.description: verify a MediaWiki ".xml" export against a ".ots.json" collection of OpenTimestamps receipts
